sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  import { Playground, PropsTable } from 'docz';
import Button from './Button';

export default ({components, ...props}) => <MDXTag name="wrapper"  components={components}>
<MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h1" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Button`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`눌러서 제어하는 기능을 담당하는 컴포넌트입니다.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"props"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#props"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Props`}</MDXTag>
<PropsTable of={Button} />
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#basic-usage"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Basic usage`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={1} __code={`<Button>Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button>
    Click me
  </Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-sizes"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-sizes"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different sizes`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={2} __code={`<Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
<Button size="md">Click me</Button>
<Button size="sm">Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button size="lg">Click me</Button>
  <Button size="md">Click me</Button>
  <Button size="sm">Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-colors"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-colors"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different colors`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={3} __code={`<Button color="black" backgroundColor="pink">
  BLACKPINK
</Button>
<Button color="pink" backgroundColor="black">
  BLACKPINK
</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button color="black" backgroundColor="pink">BLACKPINK</Button>
  <Button color="pink" backgroundColor="black">BLACKPINK</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-icons"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-icons"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different icons`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={4} __code={`<Button leftIconSrc="https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/class101-ui/images/ic-plus-black.png">
  Click me
</Button>
<Button rightIconSrc="https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/class101-ui/images/ic-plus-black.png">
  Click me
</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button leftIconSrc="https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/class101-ui/images/ic-plus-black.png">Click me</Button>
  <Button rightIconSrc="https://s3.ap-northeast-2.amazonaws.com/class101-ui/images/ic-plus-black.png">Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"with-different-alignsonly-block"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#with-different-alignsonly-block"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`With different aligns(Only block)`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={5} __code={`<Button textAlign="left" block>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button textAlign="center" block>
  Click me
</Button>
<Button textAlign="right" block>
  Click me
</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button textAlign="left" block>Click me</Button>
  <Button textAlign="center" block>Click me</Button>
  <Button textAlign="right" block>Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"disabled-button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#disabled-button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Disabled button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={6} __code={`<Button disabled>Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button disabled>Click me</Button>
</Playground>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"loading-button"}}><MDXTag name="a" components={components} parentName="h2" props={{"aria-hidden":true,"href":"#loading-button"}}><MDXTag name="span" components={components} parentName="a" props={{"className":"icon-link"}}>{`#`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>{`Loading button`}</MDXTag>
<Playground __position={7} __code={`<Button loading>Click me</Button>`} __scope={{props,Button}}>
  <Button loading>Click me</Button>
</Playground></MDXTag>
